text: 2:23 Onger Akaba 7:9; 62:12; Jeremaia 11:20; 17:10; Rom 8:27; 2 Korin 5:10; 2 Timoti 4:14; Akar Mogomem 20:12-13Kɨ uaghan an boribav sueghtɨ me arɨmɨghiregham. Eghtɨ siosba bar kamaghɨn fogham, kɨ bar gumazibar naviba ko nɨghnɨzibagh fogha da tuisɨsi. Egh kɨ ia amir arazibar mɨrara ivezim isɨ vaghvagh ia danɨngam.
